attributes.action: Make education about SEND compulsory in schools
attributes.additional_details: It effects hundreds of thousands of people and it is never talked about so those people often feel disrespected and mistreated. If kids at a young age are taught about SEND then SEND people may be more appreciated in society
attributes.background: Make education about SEND compulsory as there is a lack of knowledge and stigma around it and it effects a lot of people
